original_text: Jeshua's son, Ezer, worked on another part of the wall. It was in front of the building where the soldiers kept their weapons. He repaired the wall as far as the corner. Ezer ruled over Mizpah.
korean_text: 그 다음은 미스바를 다스리는 예수아의 아들 에셀이 한 부분을 중수하여 성 굽이에 있는 군기고 맞은편까지 이르렀고

sentences.original_text: Jeshua's son, Ezer, worked on another part of the wall.
sentences.korean_translation: 여수아의 아들 에셀은 성벽의 다른 부분을 일했습니다.

sentences.original_text: It was in front of the building
where the soldiers kept their weapons.
He repaired the wall as far as the corner.
